summary: CAR WILL NOT START WITH FIRST TURN OF THE IGNITION, NEED TO CRANK AND STEP ON GAS ABOUT 3 OR 4 TIMES BEFORE CAR WILL START.  TOOK INTO DEALER SERVICE DEPT AND REPORTED THE PROBLEM.  THEY STATED THAT THEY COULD NOT FIND ANYTHING WRONG.  SERVICE DEPT TOLD ME THAT I WOULD HAVE TO JUST WAIT UNTIL IT DOESN'T START AT ALL.
